subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Chris Paul narrowly missed his seventh triple-double of the season, with 31 points, 17 assists and 9 rebounds, and the New Orleans Hornets defeated the Dallas Mavericks.
snippet: Chris Paul narrowly missed his seventh triple-double of the season, with 31 points, 17 assists and 9 rebounds, and the New Orleans Hornets defeated the Dallas Mavericks.
